name: Gearforged Templar
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The gearforged templar makes three attacks with its glaive.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Whirlwind (recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The gearforged templar whirls its glaive in a great arc. Every creature within 10 feet of the gearforged takes 16 (3d10) slashing damage, or half damage with a successful DC 16 Dexterity saving throw.

special_abilities.name: Defensive Zone
special_abilities.desc: The gearforged templar can make an opportunity attack when a creature enters its reach.

special_abilities.name: Onslaught
special_abilities.desc: As a bonus action, the gearforged can make a Shove attack.
